Question
========

The variable \"Severity of migraines\" is measured by having patients 
track how many migraine attacks they have per week. This is an example of a:

Answerlist
----------

* continuous quantitative variable
* discrete quantitative variable
* numerical categorical variable

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------


* continuous quantitative variable: Incorrect
* discrete quantitative variable: Correct
* numerical categorical variable: Incorrect
